xwikidoc.title: InstructionalComponentClass Sheet
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} {{html wiki=true}} ## You can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object. ## At first you should keep the default presentation and just save the document.
#if($context.action == 'inline') ; $msg.get('core.editors.content.titleField.label') : <input type="text" name="title" value="$escapetool.xml($doc.title)" size="30" /> #else = ${doc.displayTitle} = #end
#if($context.action == 'inline') ; $msg.get('core.editors.content.parentField.label') : <input type="text" name="parent" value="$escapetool.xml($doc.parent)" size="30" class="suggestDocuments" /> #else ; $msg.get('core.editors.content.parentField.label') : $doc.parent #end
#set($class = $doc.getObject('CurrikiCode.EducationalLevelClass').xWikiClass) #foreach($prop in $class.properties) ; $prop.prettyName : $doc.display($prop.getName()) #end {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
